sentences.sContent: In view of the above, the transformation properties of astigmatic elliptic Gaussian beams are analysed overall, the exact formulas of correcting astigmatism and rotary symmetrize transformation.
sentences.sContent_eng: In view of the above, the transformation properties of astigmatic elliptic Gaussian beams are analysed overall, the exact formulas of correcting astigmatism and rotary symmetrize transformation.
sentences.sCn: 分析像散椭圆高斯光束的传输变换特性，推导出半导体激光束的像散校正与旋转对称化变换公式。

remMethod.val: a + stigma(污点) + tic → 看不见污点 → 散光的

words.tran: [眼科] 散光；[光][电子] 像散性；[光][电子] 像散现象

trans.tranOther: relating to or affected with astigmatism
